Name: williamsamaddar
Title: Do not miss
Review: If someone aspires to have a darshan of the Char Dhams along with the twelve Jyotirlingas in one place and under one roof, this special temple located on the west of Rudra Sagar lake [ opposite side of Mahakaleshwar Jyotirling Temple ] is the place to be.  A cave like structure leading to a tunnel will also give one a feeling of Vaishno Devi and a glimpse to a host of other deities. Children will enjoy this place a lot.

Name: Ankit Kapoor
Title: Char Dham Temple
Review: This temple consists of replicas of the Char Dhams, 12 Jyotirlingas & a tunneled walkway replicating Maa Vaishno Shrine. Location is near Mahakaleshwar parking.

Name: Gdj
Title: Char dham temple ujjain
Review: Most famous temple in ujjain.all char dham gods murtis at one premices in varrious attractive manner.

Name: Dhruv Bhargava
Review: Temple is well maintained and Beautiful.chardham gallery is beautiful and ashram also well maintained

Name: Mili Dutta
Title: Divine
Review: Char Dham is a must visit at Ujjain. Divinity at its best. Must visit incase you are Ujjain. Blessed!!

Name: Gdj
Title: Char dham mandir ujjain
Review: Chardhar mandir temple is situated in jaisingh pura area near to hardiddhi temple.in this temple atrractive murtis of lord.

Name: Sivakumar V
Title: A Temple for all the important Holy Shrines across the country
Review: All in one- this may be the correct description of this char Dham Temple in Ujjain. We can see the deities located in the famous chardhams - Kedarnath , Bhadrinath , Gongothri & Yamuothri , & the Gods of Puri , Dwaraka Vaishnavo Devi , Dwaraka Ahobilam --all could be worshiped in this temple. Beautifully organised including a cave like structure is a must-see in Ujjain. Well maintained and is open all days.

Name: alpsbt27
Title: beautiful place
Review: visited char dham mandir on sunday on Ujjain tour. its really beautiful place and quality time space and make feel energetic.

Name: Himanshu Bhatt
Title: 4 dham at one place
Review: Its a 15 year old temple situated at the back side of mahakaleshwar temple where you can find four temples ( 4 DHAMS ) at one place apart from temple there is small spiritual exhibition is also there which you can visit by paying a nominal ticket fee 10 rs. but worth to see at this price.

Name: Gdj
Title: Char dham mandir ujjain
Review: This temple located at jaisinghpura area of ujjain.there is murtis of chardham god under one roof. Temples attraction most like by me.

Name: rathod2017
Title: Char Dham Mandir
Review: Char Dham Mandir is nice temple. this is a replica of char dham. so many statues are there. nice experience to visit this place.

Name: Dipen Shah
Title: One time visit
Review: We had been to ujjain for jyotirling darshan and happen to visit herer as local city tour.Its okay and you can visit one time.Best is dwarkadhish temple

Name: Vishnu Pendyala
Title: Replicas of the 4 dhams
Review: There is also a guest house inside for pilgrims to stay. Also visit the mini spiritual theme park on the side.

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: Not at all maintained
Review: The temple houses four shines for Jagannath, ramanathaswamy,badrinath and dwarkeshwar, think its not maintained and can be avoided.

Name: meenakshimuthusamy
Title: Nice temple to visit
Review: The place is clean and has got neat look.The temple is very famous temple in the place in the city of ujjain.

Name: Dilip123
Title: A fairly new temple
Review: Ujjain is a city steeped in history and temples here are thousands of years old. In a such an ancient city, the char dham mandir is a fairly new temple with modern construction and concrete idols. This did not attract us having visited other ancient shrines in the city.It can be avoided in case of shortage of time.

Name: arunbvkumar
Title: Char Dham Mandir
Review: This is good place to see if there is time available  the replicas of all the 4 important religious places and also an additional Vaishnov Mata temple.

Name: Rohit C
Title: Nice temple
Review: Nice templeMust visit when you are in ujjainFour temples are inside in this templeMata devi temple is also there

Name: Ktishan Kant Lavania
Title: Good Temple chaar dham at one place & Mata Veshno Devi
Review: Visited this temple with my mother, good new temple, you can visit chaar dham at one place withMata Veshno devi temple,So many Jhankis are also there.

Name: DreamerDisha
Title: Good temple but no historical significance
Review: Replicas of the char dhams, few jhankis. Does not have any historical significance as a temple . Not a must visit temple when in Ujjain. If there for a day trip, can avoid. If have time at hand, go visit. Close to Harsidhi temple

Name: Vidhi_sharmah
Title: chaar dham at one place
Review: amazing temple and it is believed that visiting this one temple gives fruits of visiting four dhams which are situated too far away from each other

Name: nik_0107
Title: Four Dhams
Review: The newly build temple is clean and offer glimpse of all four dhams- Puri, Rameswaram, Dwarka, Badrinath.

Name: Anjani S
Title: nice mandir with JHAKI
Review: you will have all four dhams here only. nice mandir. it has a borading school of little kids who are studying vedas. jhaki is very good here.

Name: Nish0901
Title: All four dhams at one place
Review: We visited this place after visiting  Shri Mahakaleshwar Temple & Harsiddhi Mata Temple. The temple was clean and glimpse of all four dhams was the main feature there. There is a small garden outside where you can take rest.

Name: Kumar K
Title: Interesting temple of the four Dhams
Review: This temple depicts the four Dhams - Puri, Rameswaram, Dwarka, Badrinath. Nice place to visit. The outside of the temple can be kept a little clean.This temple is located about 100 m from Harsiddhi temple.

Name: Vipin Arora
Title: A nice place to visit
Review: This temple is located close to Harsidhhi temple and symbolically holds the deities of all four dhaams as enshrined in Hindu texts . Good ambience

Name: niya27
Title: Near Vikram Teela
Review: There are many important temples in Ujjain. This temple is one of them. After Harsiddhi temple visit, you can go to this temple. Garden outside is nice. If you are with children, must go there.

Name: parmanand06
Title: char dham
Review: Mandir is near to mahakal temple.It is a temple and Ashram where Vedas are being taught to students.you can see murti of Chardham ie Badrinath, Dwarka, Rameshwar and Jagannathji.Calm place with a soothing environment. Nice to be around.

Name: Prat C
Title: Good!
Review: Worth a visit! The setup and arrangement is good.You can see little pandas in the making here,being taught the traditional culture of ujjain! Its a good sight to calm yourself but not in the rush hours.You wont wanna go then.Its made for peace,calmness and serenity!

Name: Kawaljeet Singh
Title: Hindu Worship Temple in Ujjain
Review: one of the famous temple in ujjain. this temple is main attraction for hindus. located near Mahakal mandir.

Name: RamGanesan
Title: Well Kept modern Mandir
Review: This mandir is around a kilometer from the Mahakal temple.  We chose to walk, but there are autos and share autos that can take you back and forth from the center of town. A well kept temple and we visited it at around 8.30 PM in the evening and there was literally no crowd. It is based on  the famous Char Dham temples. The temple is constructed in a layered fashion where one can see deities of the four Dhams one by one in each level.  The main attraction at this temple is the thematic Vaishnavo devi temple constructed at the sides.  There is a fee of INR 5 to enter this thematic place and can get the feeling of climbing inside a mountain akin to Vaishnovo Devi.  Kids will definitely like the place and it is more existing that a temple in that sense for them,  Photography inside this place is not allowed.  A must visit place when in Ujjain.

Name: ChennaiFocus
Title: Temple next to Harsiddhi Mandir
Review: It is a temple and Ashram where Vedas are being taught to students. You can see different forms of Krishna and also a simulation of Vaishno Devi Mandir. Different experience.

Name: Jagadish S
Title: very nice recreation
Review: a very nice temple near the Mahakala temple. the dieties of all the main 4 dhams - Puri, dwaraka, rameshwaram and badrinath - is depicted in 4 small temples. worth a visit

Name: Manish B
Title: Beautiful Temple
Review: Recent addition to the city the temple was build in 1967 and approx 4 kms from Ujjain railways station. Very good place to visit and spend some time in worship and meditation.

Name: Shubham06
Title: Calm soothing place
Review: As the name suggests it is known for Char Dhams. Calm place with a soothing environment. Nice to be around.

Name: guptaashok_0511
Title: Relegious Place
Review: This is a Relegious place with murti so far Chardham ie Badrinath, Dwarka, Rameshwar and Jagannathji. It is has a show of Electric jhankis, not to be missed.
